code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Clock(){const[time,setTime]=useState();useEffect(()=>{setInterval(()=>{const dateObject=new Date();const hour=dateObject.getHours();const minute=dateObject.getMinutes();let currentTime=hour+':'+minute;let map=new Map([[0,"Jan"],[1,"Feb"],[2,"Mar"],[3,"Apr"],[4,"May"],[5,"Jun"],[6,"Jul"],[7,"Aug"],[8,"Sep"],[9,"Oct"],[10,"Nov"],[11,"Dec"]]);currentTime=map.get(dateObject.getMonth())+" "+dateObject.getDate()+" "+currentTime;setTime(currentTime);},1000);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Clock",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:time})})});}export default Clock;
